Something Strange
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Something Strange
By Bethegus on Sunday, June 11, 2006 - 02:07 pm:

First, I'm going to say that it's been awhile since I've been here. Now that that's out, I saw something weird. When I use the Lord of the Rings 2 Towers DVD to create a Chaos Durahan, it works, but it saves the stats of the Chaos Durahan from the MF4 Pandora disk. Any idea why it does that?

By Apocalypse on Monday, June 12, 2006 - 05:16 pm:

Every monster has a specified set of book stats. If you wish to make a Chaos Durahan with the stats from the the 2 towers, you will need to have the DVD.

By Bethegus on Monday, June 12, 2006 - 05:37 pm:

Alright. That makes sense. Thanks ;).
